_source.text: After a crushing breakup, Spencer (Roux) is forced through a "mantervention" by best friend Coke (Van Winkle) because, "There's nothing better than the next one to get over the ex-one."

text: (Van Winkle) **because**, "There's nothing **better** **than** the **next** one to get over the ex-one."
After **a** crushing breakup, Spencer (**Roux**) is forced through **a** "mantervention" by best friend Coke
